Package com.xebisco.yield

Class PlatformInit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebisco.yield.PlatformInit
  • public class PlatformInit
extends java.lang.Object
    It's a class that holds the initial configuration of the specific platform.

        Parameters:

        public void setWindowIconPath​(java.lang.String windowIconPath)
        This function sets the path of the window icon in a Yield application.
        Parameters:
        windowIconPath - The parameter "windowIconPath" is a string that represents the file path of the icon that will be displayed in the window.

      • setUiResolution

        public void setUiResolution​(Size2D uiResolution)
        This function sets the UI resolution to a specified Size2D object.
        Parameters:
        uiResolution - uiResolution is a variable of type Size2D that represents the resolution of the user interface (UI). It is used to set the size of the UI in two dimensions (width and height).

      • getGameResolution

        This function sets the game resolution to a specified Size2D object.
        Parameters:
        gameResolution - The parameter `gameResolution` is of type `Size2D`, Is representing the dimensions of the game screen.

      • getResolution

        public Size2D getResolution()
        The function returns the resolution as a Size2D object.
        Returns:
        The method is returning an object of type `Size2D`, which represents the resolution of the window.

      • setResolution

        public void setResolution​(Size2D resolution)
        This function sets the resolution of a window to a specified Size2D value.
        Parameters:

      • getWindowIcon

        public Texture getWindowIcon()
        This function returns the window icon as a Texture object in Yield.
        Returns:
        The method is returning a Texture object named "windowIcon".

      • setWindowIcon

        public void setWindowIcon​(Texture windowIcon)
        This function sets the window icon of a Yield application.
        Parameters:
        windowIcon - The parameter "windowIcon" is a Texture object that represents the icon of a window in a Yield application. The method "setWindowIcon" sets the value of the windowIcon instance variable to the value passed as a parameter.
